title: Uptown, Chicago
summary: Uptown is one of Chicago, Illinoisâ€™ 77 community areas. Uptown's boundaries are Foster Avenue on the north; Lake Michigan on the east; Montrose (Ravenswood to Clark), and Irving Park (Clark Street to Lake Michigan) on the south; Ravenswood (Foster to Montrose), and Clark (Montrose to Irving Park) on the west.[2] To the north is Edgewater, to the west is Lincoln Square, and to the south is Lake View.
